table.name: claim_line_item
table.description: Stores line items for a claim

columns.name: CLAIM_GID
columns.description: The claim GID.

columns.name: LINE_ITEM_SEQ_NO
columns.description: Sequence number to keep claim line items unique; actual line items should start with sequence number 1; 0 is reserved to attach costs that relate to the claim as a whole.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order release (if applicable) to which this claim line item applies.

columns.name: SERIAL_NUMBER
columns.description: Serial number for the claim line item.

columns.name: DAMAGE_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Type of damage; these values are user defined.

columns.name: DAMAGED_WEIGHT
columns.description: Weight of damaged portion.

columns.name: DAMAGED_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM qualifier for damaged weight.

columns.name: DAMAGED_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Damaged weight in base UOM.

columns.name: DAMAGED_VOLUME
columns.description: Volume of damaged portion.

columns.name: DAMAGED_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM qualifier for damaged volume.

columns.name: DAMAGED_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: Damaged volume in base UOM.

columns.name: DAMAGED_QUANTITY
columns.description: Quantity of damaged goods.

columns.name: DAMAGED_FRACTION
columns.description: Percentage of damage.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_WEIGHT
columns.description: Total or original weight for the line item (undamaged + damaged goods).

columns.name: ORIGINAL_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM qualifier for original weight.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Original weight in base UOM.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_VOLUME
columns.description: Total or original volume for the line item (undamaged + damaged goods).

columns.name: ORIGINAL_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM qualifier for original volume.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: Original volume in base UOM.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_QUANTITY
columns.description: Total or original quantity for the line item (undamaged + damaged goods).

columns.name: NEW_WEIGHT
columns.description: New weight after reconditioning activities.

columns.name: NEW_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM qualifier for new weight.

columns.name: NEW_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: New weight in base UOM.

columns.name: NEW_VOLUME
columns.description: New volume after reconditioning activities

columns.name: NEW_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM qualifier for new volume.

columns.name: NEW_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: New volume in base UOM.

columns.name: NEW_QUANTITY
columns.description: New quantity after reconditioning activities.

columns.name: REMOVED_WEIGHT
columns.description: Weight of portion that was removed as part of reconditioning.

columns.name: REMOVED_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM qualifier for removed weight.

columns.name: REMOVED_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Removed weight in base UOM.

columns.name: REMOVED_VOLUME
columns.description: Volume of portion that was removed as part of reconditioning.

columns.name: REMOVED_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM qualifier for removed volume.

columns.name: REMOVED_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: Removed volume in base UOM.

columns.name: REMOVED_QUANTITY
columns.description: Quantity of goods that were removed as part of reconditioning.

columns.name: ORIG_CYLINDER_DIAM
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, the original diameter prior to damage.

columns.name: ORIG_CYLINDER_DIAM_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM qualifier for original cylinder diameter.

columns.name: ORIG_CYLINDER_DIAM_BASE
columns.description: Original cylinder diameter in base UOM.

columns.name: ORIG_CYL_CORE_DIAM
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, the hollow core diameter that should not be counted as damaged product in damage calculations.

columns.name: ORIG_CYL_CORE_DIAM_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM qualifier for original cylinder core diameter.

columns.name: ORIG_CYL_CORE_DIAM_BASE
columns.description: Original cylinder core diameter in base UOM.

columns.name: REMOVED_CYL_DEPTH
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, the depth from the outer edge of the cylinder that was removed.

columns.name: REMOVED_CYL_DEPTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM qualifier for removed cylinder depth.

columns.name: REMOVED_CYL_DEPTH_BASE
columns.description: Removed cylinder depth in base UOM.

columns.name: NEW_CYLINDER_DIAM
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, the new diameter of the object.

columns.name: NEW_CYLINDER_DIAM_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM qualifier for new cylinder diameter.

columns.name: NEW_CYLINDER_DIAM_BASE
columns.description: New cylinder diameter in base UOM.

columns.name: REMOVED_FRACTION
columns.description: Percentage of goods removed as part of reconditioning.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE
columns.description: Declared value of the entire amount of goods represented on the line; the system will populate this when creating a claim from objects in GC3 if the declared value is available.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for currency for the declared value currency.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_BASE
columns.description: Declared value amount in base currency.

columns.name: PACKAGE_STATUS_GID
columns.description: Indicates the status of packages on the claim line item.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: Transport handling unit for the claim line item.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT
columns.description: Sales value of goods per unit specified (for a $10/lb. value, this field represents the $10 part); used in the damage value calculation.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: Currency for the price per unit value.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT_BASE
columns.description: Base amount for the price per unit value.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT_UOM_TYPE
columns.description: UOM type of the unit for which sales value is defined such as 'weight' or 'volume'; used in the damage value calculation.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM for the per value for size of loss (for a $10/lb. value, this field represents the 'lb.' part); used in the damage value calculation.

columns.name: SIZE_OF_LOSS
columns.description: The calculated total of all claim line item costs for this claim line item.

columns.name: SIZE_OF_LOSS_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: Currency for the system calculated total of all claim line item costs for this claim line item.

columns.name: SIZE_OF_LOSS_BASE
columns.description: Base amount for the system calculated total of all claim line item costs for this claim line item.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
